title: Chou! Isekai Gakkyuu!! - Novel Updates
genre: Comedy   Fantasy   Harem   Romance   School Life   Shounen   Slice of Life
tags: Beastkin   Demon Lord   Dragons   Elves   Fairies   Knights   Male Protagonist   Modern Day   Vampires
author: Sorano Kazuki   空埜一樹
description: After an incident, interactions with many different worlds started in the modern society. Elves, women knights, vampires, cat eared girls, fairies, and even demon lords are freely walking in Japan, and to allow them to study the special class “Itoku” was created! In Itoku, a boy, Yakuma Mamoru, became the class representative and began a fullfilling school life as his classmates from different worlds relied on and became attached to him!>
